info.description:
This is a collection of APIs to support the Load Control Functionality

The base endpoint URL for this API in production is: `https://marko.aramark.net/i1/load_control`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: Load Control

requestBody.description: JSON body containing the workflow parameters. Each request must contain the 'type' parameter as well as all parameters returned by the GET Workflow Parameters API

JSON Body containing the Override parameters. Each request must contain a target_system of either ODS or GFF. ODS request must contain batch_id and source_system. GFF requests must contain utb_id and source_system
JSON Body containing the Cleanup parameters.

apiKey.name: apikey
apiKey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

workflowNameReqParam.name: workflow
workflowNameReqParam.description: Name of the Load Control workflow

folderNameReqParam.name: folder
folderNameReqParam.description: Name of the Load Control folder

sizeParam.name: size
sizeParam.description: Number of records to be returned in each page of result set

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache.

parameter_1.description: Example of a parameter. Must be aligned with GET Workflow Parameters API output

parameter_2.description: Example of a parameter. Must be aligned with GET Workflow Parameters API output

batch_id.description: ID of the batch to be overridden (ODS Only)

utb_id.description: UTB ID of the batch to be overridden (GFF Only)

source_system.description: Source System that corresponds to the Batch that needs to be overridden

target_system.description: Target System of the batch to be overridden (ODS or GFF)

batch_id.description: ID of the batch to be cleaned up

source_system.description: Source System that corresponds to the Batch that needs to be cleaned up

target_system.description: Target System of the batch to be cleanuped up (ODS or GFF)
